SA15n1272:244: sānvayatve ca kā kasya pravṛttirnivṛttirvā iti yatkiñcidetat |
SA15n1272:245: athavā yadi ca kasyacitsvabhāvasya pravṛttirnivṛttirveti svayamapyabhyanujñāyate,
SA15n1272:256: tā avasthāḥ sā ca śaktiḥ kimeko bhavaḥ ?

SA15n1272:278: sthitāvasthitiḥ ityādikaṃ nānātvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kathaṃ yotsyate ?

SA15n1272:300: na ca śakteḥ śaktyātmani prādurbhāvaḥ iti tasyāḥ svātmano'bhedo na syāt !
SA15n1272:302: yo'pi hi kalpayed - 'yo yasya pariṇāmaḥ sa tasmādabhinnaḥ' iti |
SA15n1272:304: kiñcedamuktaṃ bhavati - pariṇāma ityavasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ,

SA15n1272:315: tadā tasya nivṛttiprādurbhāvābhyaṃ na dravyasya pariṇatiḥ |
SA15n1272:318: dravyasya dharma iti ca vyapadeśo na sidhyati,

SA15n1272:327: pūrvakānmṛtpiṇḍadravyāt kāraṇāduttarasya ghaṭadravyasya kāryasyotpattau 'mṛd dravyaṃ pariṇatam' iti vyavahārasyopagamāt |
SA15n1272:328: na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyāmanyo vikalpaḥ sambhavati,

SA15n1272:567: tatraivaṃ brūmaḥ - pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmastaṃ yadā svadṛṣṭānte'bhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ |
SA15n1272:568: tatra dṛṣṭaścāsāvante ca vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
SA15n1272:572: yathā 'anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād' iti bruvan pratipakṣavādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha - 'yadi sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo'pyevamastu' ityeṣā pratijñāhāniḥ,
SA15n1272:574: 40. atropagatapratijñātyāgāt pratijñāhānau viśeṣapratiniyamaḥ kiṃkṛto'nena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhāniriti |
SA15n1272:575: sambhavati hyanenāpi prakāreṇa hetudoṣodbhāvanādinā pratipakṣasādhanābhidhānena ca svapakṣaparityāgaḥ,

SA15n1272:596: sa hi pūrvasyāḥ 'anityaḥ śabda' iti pratijñāyāḥ sādhanāttadā yām 'asarvagataḥ śabda' iti pratijñāmāha,

SA15n1272:604: aindriyakatvasya hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite'sarvagatatve satyaindriyakatvasyahetorviśeṣaṇopādāne vyābhicāraṃ pariharati,
SA15n1272:610: na hi pratijñā pratijñāsādhanāyocyamānā pratijñāntaraṃ bhavati |
SA15n1272:618: yo hi prāk pratijñāmuktvā hetūdāharaṇādikaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti,
SA15n1272:624: evaṃprakārāṇāmasambaddhānāṃ parisaṃkhyātumaśakyatvāt lakṣaṇaniyamo'pyasambadaddha eva - pratijñāntarābhidhāne pratijñāntaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti |
SA15n1272:626: na caivaṃvidhaḥ kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvo vyavahāro yena tadarthaṃ yatnaḥ kriyate |
SA15n1272:630: 45. dṛśyate ca viduṣāmapi nātinirūpaṇādasiddhābhidhānamiti vyavahāradarśanāt tādṛśaṃ parājayādhikaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1272:633: evaṃ yadi prativādī satsāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityaṃ ca pramāṇena pratipādayituṃ śaknuyāt anuddiśyāpramāṇakaṃ śāstropagamaṃ,

SA15n1272:687: vyatiriktānāmapi bhāvānāṃ kutaścid viprakarṣiṇāṃ tadvyatirekeṇānupalabdhāvapi vyatirekasya bhāvāt |

SA15n1272:1226: yathā - 'bhavāṃścauraḥ puruṣatvāt' ityukte sa taṃ prati brūyād-bhavānapīti |
SA15n1272:1227: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe taṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatamanujānātīti matānujñā nigrahasthānamiti |
SA15n1272:1233: prasaṅgamantareṇaivamṛjunaiva krameṇa kiṃ na vyabhicārita iti cet |
SA15n1272:1235: santi hyevamprakārā api vyavahārā loka iti |
SA15n1272:1239: tatsādhananirdoṣatāyāṃ hi tadabhyupagama evottarāpratipattiriti tāvataiva pūrvamāpannanigrahasya paradoṣopakṣepasyānapekṣaṇīyatvāditi |
SA15n1272:1245: atrāpi yadi sādhanavādinaṃ nigrahaprāptamuttaravādī na paryanuyuṅkte,
SA15n1272:1255: na santa iti kṛtvā sarve doṣā avaśyaṃ vaktavyāḥ |
SA15n1272:1258: yathaikasyārthasyānekasādhanasadbhāve'pyekenaiva sādhanena tatsiddherna sarvopādānam iti na doṣamudbhāvayannevāparasyānudbhāvanānnigrahārhaḥ pūrvavat |
SA15n1272:1259: atha pūrvapakṣavādī uttarapakṣavādinaṃ nigrahaprāptaṃ na nigṛṇhāti,
SA15n1272:1267: “ [nyā. sū. 5.2.23] nigrahasthānalakṣaṇasya mithyāvyavasāyādanigrahasthāne nigṛhīto'sīti paraṃ bruvan niranuyojyānuyogānnigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ |
SA15n1272:1269: so'sthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya niyoktodbhāvayitā na bhavati tathā |
SA15n1272:1272: tasya tena bhūtadoṣatve pratipādite sādhanābhāsavacanenaiva nigṛhīta iti |
SA15n1272:1274: avaśyaṃ hi viṣayāntaraprāptyarthaṃ hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvena vaktavyāḥ,
SA15n1272:1277: “ [nyā. sū. 5.2.24] kasyacidarthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayāt kathāprasaṅgaṃ kurvato'pasiddhānto vijñeyaḥ |
SA15n1272:1279: nāsadutpadyate' iti siddhāntamabhyupetya pakṣamavasthāpayati - 'ekāntā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya avyaktalakṣaṇā;
SA15n1272:1284: sa evamuktavān paryanuyujyate - atha prakṛtirvikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam ?
SA15n1272:1285: yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ,
SA15n1272:1286: yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti |
SA15n1272:1291: pravṛttirvā-ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti,
SA15n1272:1295: ito'pina kaścidaniyamāt kathāprasaṅgo yattenopagataṃ nāsadutpadyate na sadvinaśyati' iti tasya samarthanāyedamuktam 'ekaprakṛtikamidaṃ vyaktamanvayadarśanād' iti |
SA15n1272:1299: sukhādīnāmutpattivināśābhyupagamābhāvāt sarvasya tadātmakasya notpatti-vināśāviti siddhaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1272:1300: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati |
SA15n1272:1301: tatredaṃ syād vācyaṃ - vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛttinivṛttidharmakaṃ,
SA15n1272:1307: evaṃ hi tasya sādhanadoṣodbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito bhavati |
SA15n1272:1312: na lokaḥ śabdairapratipāditamarthaṃ pratipattuṃ samartha iti,
SA15n1272:1316: kathāprasaṅgāt iti idamapi hetvābhāseṣvantarbhāvāt na pṛthagvācyam |
SA15n1272:1322: atrāpi yathoktatvāccintyemeva - kiṃ te yathā lakṣitaprabhedāstathaiva,
